result.eng: What did you do at the weekend?

result.html: Cad a rinne tú ag an deireadh seachtaineWhat did you do at the weekend?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú ag an deireaḋ seaċtaineWhat did you do at the weekend?

result.eng: What did you do during your life until now?

result.html: Cad a rinne tú ar feadh do shaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú ar feaḋ do ẛaoil go dtí seoWhat did you do during your life until now?

result.eng: What did you do on Sunday?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú Dé Domhnaigh

result.html: Cad a rinne tú Dé DomhnaighWhat did you do on Sunday?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú Dé DoṁnaiġWhat did you do on Sunday?

result.eng: What dod you do after the meeting?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.orig: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.html: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnitheWhat dod you do after the meeting?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaiḋ an ċruinniṫeWhat dod you do after the meeting?

result.eng: Whoever did it, he will pay for it.
result.ga: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé as
result.orig: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé as
result.html: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaidh sé asWhoever did it, he will pay for it.
result.ponchtml: Cibé duine a rinne é íocfaiḋ sé asWhoever did it, he will pay for it.

result.eng: Who did this?
result.ga: Cé a rinne é seo
result.orig: Cé a rinne é seo
result.html: Cé a rinne é seoWho did this?
result.ponchtml: Cé a rinne é seoWho did this?

result.eng: What did you do?
result.ga: Céard a rinne tú
result.orig: Céard a rinne tú
result.html: Céard a rinne túWhat did you do?
result.ponchtml: Céard a rinne túWhat did you do?

result.eng: He does not care what I did.
result.ga: Is cuma leis cad a rinne mé
result.orig: Is cuma leis cad a rinne mé
result.html: Is cuma leis cad a rinne méHe does not care what I did.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma leis cad a rinne méHe does not care what I did.

result.eng: We did as we said we would.
result.ga: Rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.orig: Rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.html: Rinne muid beart de réir briathairWe did as we said we would.
result.ponchtml: Rinne muid beart de réir briaṫairWe did as we said we would.

result.eng: I made you breakfast.
result.ga: Rinne mé bricfeasta duit
result.orig: Rinne mé bricfeasta duit
result.html: Rinne mé bricfeasta duitI made you breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé bricfeasta duitI made you breakfast.

result.eng: I congratulated her on her birthday.
result.ga: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithlá
result.orig: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithlá
result.html: Rinne mé comhghairdeas léi ar a breithláI congratulated her on her birthday.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé coṁġairdeas léi ar a breiṫláI congratulated her on her birthday.

result.eng: I forgot to call you.
result.ga: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ort
result.orig: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ort
result.html: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ortI forgot to call you.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé dearmad glaoċ a ċur ortI forgot to call you.

result.eng: I made a compaint to the County Council.
result.ga: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle Contae
result.orig: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle Contae
result.html: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle ContaeI made a compaint to the County Council.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé gearán leis an Ċoṁairle ContaeI made a compaint to the County Council.

result.eng: They tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ga: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga
result.orig: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga
result.html: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine ógaThey tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad iarraċt úsáid na Gaeilge a ċur ċun cinn i measc daoine ógaThey tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.

result.eng: They did it against my will.
result.ga: Rinne siad in aghaidh mo thola é
result.orig: Rinne siad in aghaidh mo thola é
result.html: Rinne siad in aghaidh mo thola éThey did it against my will.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad in aġaiḋ mo ṫola éThey did it against my will.

result.eng: He made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ga: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre
result.orig: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre
result.html: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíreHe made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíreHe made a sacrifice for the country.

result.eng: You made a mistake in the exam.
result.ga: Rinne tú botún sa scrúdú
result.orig: Rinne tú botún sa scrúdú
result.html: Rinne tú botún sa scrúdúYou made a mistake in the exam.
result.ponchtml: Rinne tú botún sa scrúdúYou made a mistake in the exam.

result.eng: You did a wonderful job.
result.ga: Rinne tú jab iontach
result.orig: Rinne tú jab iontach
result.html: Rinne tú jab iontachYou did a wonderful job.
result.ponchtml: Rinne tú jab iontaċYou did a wonderful job.

result.eng: She studied medicine.
result.ga: Rinne sí staidéar ar an leigheas
result.orig: Rinne sí staidéar ar an leigheas
result.html: Rinne sí staidéar ar an leigheasShe studied medicine.
result.ponchtml: Rinne sí staidéar ar an leiġeasShe studied medicine.

result.eng: This is one of the mistakes you made.
result.ga: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne tú
result.orig: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne tú
result.html: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne túThis is one of the mistakes you made.
result.ponchtml: Seo é ceann de na botúin a rinne túThis is one of the mistakes you made.

result.eng: The website you made looks good.
result.ga: Tá cuma na maitheasa ar an suíomh Gréasáin a rinne tú
result.orig: Tá cuma na maitheasa ar an suíomh Gréasáin a rinne tú
result.html: Tá cuma na maitheasa ar an suíomh Gréasáin a rinne túThe website you made looks good.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na maiṫeasa ar an suíoṁ Gréasáin a rinne túThe website you made looks good.

result.eng: I did a great day's work today.
result.ga: Rinne mé an-lá oibre inniu
result.orig: Rinne mé an-lá oibre inniu
result.html: Rinne mé an-lá oibre inniuI did a great day's work today.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé an-lá oibre inniuI did a great day's work today.

result.eng: It was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ga: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.orig: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamh
result.html: Ise a rinne ceap magaidh dínne agus dár gcreideamhIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!
result.ponchtml: Ise a rinne ceap magaiḋ dínne agus dár gcreideaṁIt was she who turned us and our faith into a laughing stock!

result.eng: Everything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.
result.ga: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht air
result.orig: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht air
result.html: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht airEverything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.
result.ponchtml: Gaċ rud a rinne sé ċuir sé maise agus slaċt airEverything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.

result.eng: One of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ga: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.orig: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidín
result.html: Rinne duine amháin drannadh liom agus bhraith mé chomh beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.
result.ponchtml: Rinne duine aṁáin drannaḋ liom agus ḃraiṫ mé ċoṁ beag le mo lúidínOne of the people snarled at me and I felt as small as my little finger.

result.eng: She nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ga: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.orig: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.html: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ponchtml: Sméid sí orṫu aċ rinne siad neaṁaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ga: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.orig: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois
result.html: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: Ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: The Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ga: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.orig: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na Fraince
result.html: Rinne na Naitsithe ár uafásach ar fhir an bhaile mar dhíoltas ar ghníomhartha Fhrithbheartaíocht na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.
result.ponchtml: Rinne na Naitsiṫe ár uafásaċ ar ḟir an ḃaile mar ḋíoltas ar ġníoṁarṫa Ḟriṫḃeartaíoċt na FrainceThe Nazis perpetrated a terrible slaughter on the townsmen as revenge for the actions of the French Resistance.

result.eng: I remember one thing I did.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.html: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom rud aṁáin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí Ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad ionruaṫar ar an Iaráic bliain go leiṫ ina ḋiaiḋ sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.orig: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú
result.html: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ga: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.orig: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.html: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad amaċ fanaċt ar an talaṁ tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
